title: Wrong trade
body: So guys i sold my account to a fa''ot and he didn't send me the moneys after the deal we did.What can i do to get my account back ?

replies.body: Account selling is not something that we can offer support for, but it doesn't hurt to try.  Reach out to our account team via an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and we'll see if there's something we can do.  No guarantees, but we'll see you there!
